Entries.Mon8: {{Random:Hey there, @. I gotta say, you're looking good.#$b#All that hard work on the farm, huh?$h ++ I need to check up on George and Evelyn sometime this week.... got any tips for winning the old guy over?$h|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Tue8: {{Random:It's hard to make a profit with chickens when Alex keeps eating all the eggs...$s#$b#Worth it to see those muscles, though.$7++Well, look who it is!$h#$b#How's it going? We should hang out some time. I wanna show you some new designs I made!|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Wed8: {{Random:Oh, hi! How have you been lately?#$b#Anything exciting going on?#$e#We should grab coffee or a drink sometime when we're not both working.++Been a real busy week so far for me - I'm definitely looking forward to a nice night in with the husband. Never thought I'd be this much of a homebody!$h|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Thu8: {{Random:It took Seb a good while to finally warm up to me.$h#$b#He can be very shy around people he doesn't know.#$e#He's a good person, though.$h#$b#Don't let his shyness put you off, ok?$h++Hmm, maybe when I go visit Mr and Mrs Mullner I can pick up some spaghetti from the saloon on the way back.#$e#Pika's a genius in the kitchen but Gus really knows his pasta!$h|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Fri8: {{Random:Can you believe that Alex has never been to a club? I need to take him to downtown Zuzu and get him on the dancefloor!$h#$e#Not this weekend though. Way too much to do on the farm...++Hey, let me know if you need any help around the farm.$h#$b#I know you got it, but it never hurts to help each other out, right?|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Sat8: {{Random:Haley visited the other day and we talked about what's been going on lately.#$e#She's real sweet once you get to know her.#$b#She's got a soft spot for sunflowers, funny enough.$h++Ah, it's good to take a day off and just relax with people you care about.#$b#Not everything's about the hustle, right?$h|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Sun8: {{Random:My farm is doing great!$h#$b#Amazing harvest this week, turned a tidy profit.#$e#How about you? Anything neat happen last week?++Wish I could stop to chat for longer, but I've got to get back to work.#$b#No rest for the wicked, right?$7}}
